title: Generative AI Applications and Use Cases

questions.question: What is the primary function of text generation in generative AI?
choices: To create new, original text content
To identify grammatical errors in text
questions.answer: To create new, original text content

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a common application of generative AI in text processing?
questions.answer: Optical character recognition

questions.question: What is the main purpose of text summarization in generative AI?
choices: To generate longer versions of short texts
To translate text into multiple languages
To condense lengthy documents into concise summaries
To correct grammatical errors in text
questions.answer: To condense lengthy documents into concise summaries

questions.question: Which of the following is a prominent example of a large language model used for text generation?
questions.answer: GPT-3

questions.question: In the context of generative AI, what does DALL-E primarily do?
questions.answer: Generate images

questions.question: Which field is likely to benefit from AI-generated images for rapid prototyping?
questions.answer: Digital art and design

questions.question: What is a potential application of audio generation in generative AI?
questions.answer: Generating background music for videos

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of a code generation tool?
questions.answer: GitHub Copilot

questions.question: How can generative AI potentially impact the education sector?
choices: By eliminating the need for textbooks
questions.answer: By generating personalized learning materials

questions.question: In agriculture, how might generative AI be applied?
choices: To generate optimized crop rotation plans
To control the weather for ideal growing conditions
questions.answer: To generate optimized crop rotation plans

questions.question: How could generative AI assist in the tourism industry?
questions.answer: By generating personalized travel itineraries

questions.question: What is a potential application of generative AI in healthcare?
questions.answer: Assisting in medical report writing

questions.question: How might generative AI be used in government services?
choices: To automate responses to citizen inquiries
questions.answer: To automate responses to citizen inquiries

questions.question: What is a key ethical concern regarding generative AI?
choices: Its potential to cause physical harm
Its ability to replace all human jobs
The possibility of bias in AI-generated content
Its impact on global climate change
questions.answer: The possibility of bias in AI-generated content

questions.question: What is a potential risk associated with image generation AI?
questions.answer: Creation of deepfakes

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a core technology behind generative AI?
questions.answer: Quantum computing

questions.question: What is the primary function of GitHub Copilot?
choices: To manage version control in software development
To generate code snippets and provide coding assistance
To design user interfaces for applications
questions.answer: To generate code snippets and provide coding assistance

questions.question: How might generative AI impact the field of journalism?
choices: By assisting in news article creation and summarization
By controlling the distribution of newspapers
By determining which news stories are true or false
questions.answer: By assisting in news article creation and summarization

questions.question: What is a potential application of generative AI in the legal field?
choices: Assisting in legal research and document summarization
questions.answer: Assisting in legal research and document summarization

questions.question: How could generative AI potentially impact the music industry?
choices: By generating background music and assisting in composition
questions.answer: By generating background music and assisting in composition

questions.question: What is a key consideration when implementing generative AI in public services?
choices: The color scheme of the AI interface
The brand name of the AI system
The ethical implications and societal impact
The physical location of the AI servers
questions.answer: The ethical implications and societal impact

questions.question: How might generative AI assist in drug discovery?
choices: By replacing pharmacists in drug stores
By generating and screening potential drug candidates
questions.answer: By generating and screening potential drug candidates

questions.question: What is a potential application of generative AI in customer service?
questions.answer: Powering chatbots and virtual assistants

questions.question: How might generative AI impact the field of translation?
choices: By eliminating the need for human translators entirely
By generating more accurate and context-aware translations
By teaching humans new languages instantly
questions.answer: By generating more accurate and context-aware translations

questions.question: What is a potential use of generative AI in environmental science?
choices: Predicting climate change impacts and suggesting mitigation strategies
questions.answer: Predicting climate change impacts and suggesting mitigation strategies

questions.question: How could generative AI be applied in the field of architecture?
choices: By generating design concepts and assisting in 3D modeling
questions.answer: By generating design concepts and assisting in 3D modeling

questions.question: What is a potential application of generative AI in the fashion industry?
choices: Generating new design ideas and patterns
questions.answer: Generating new design ideas and patterns

questions.question: How might generative AI impact the field of data analysis?
choices: By generating insights and creating data visualizations
questions.answer: By generating insights and creating data visualizations

questions.question: What is a key challenge in using generative AI for content creation?
choices: The high cost of AI hardware
Ensuring originality and avoiding copyright issues
The physical distribution of AI-generated content
questions.answer: Ensuring originality and avoiding copyright issues

questions.question: How could generative AI potentially assist in language preservation?
choices: By physically teaching languages to people
By generating new content in endangered languages
By creating new languages to replace endangered ones
questions.answer: By generating new content in endangered languages
